definition: strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: Cross-sectoral international collaboration key to implementing IHR.
sentences.chinese: 跨部门的国际合作是实施《国际卫生条例》的关键。

sentences.english: Article 32 The interpreting right of this rule belongs to the Industrial Engineering section.
sentences.chinese: 第三十二条本条例解释权属组工业工程科。

sentences.english: The Regulation sets an excellent example for our futural non- contractual conflicts legislation.
sentences.chinese: 《条例》为我国非合同之债法律选择立法提供了借鉴。

sentences.english: Officials had accused them of violating health regulations.
sentences.chinese: 官员们指责他们的设备不符合卫生条例。

sentences.english: The first is an opt-out from social and employment legislation.
sentences.chinese: 他的第一步就是部分退出社会与就业相关条例。

sentences.english: Besides, the Regulations also clarify managements and managing methods of direct sales industry.
sentences.chinese: 此外，条例还明确了直销业的管理部门及管理办法。

sentences.english: Article 30 The Municipal Public Security Bureau are responsible for the interpretation of the specific application of the present regulations.
sentences.chinese: 第三十条本条例的具体应用问题由市公安局负责解释。

sentences.english: "Workers paid annual leave regulations" promulgated at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 《职工带薪年休假条例》同时出台。

sentences.english: Now, Pecos Bill could ride anything that ever was.
sentences.chinese: 现在，佩科斯条例草案将曾经有过骑不了。

sentences.english: A landlord and a new tenant are talking about rules of the building.
sentences.chinese: 一个房东和一个新房客正在讨论租赁房屋的条例。

sentences.english: We ony recruit our manpower that has been approved by Local Government Authority.
sentences.chinese: 我们配合当地政府所规定的条例来聘请劳工。

sentences.english: The conditions of non-voluntary licensing were set out in the regulation.
sentences.chinese: 该条例还规定了非自愿许可的条件。

sentences.english: What is the cause of the new airport-security rules for liquids ?
sentences.chinese: 启用新的机场液体安全条例的原因是什么？

sentences.english: How Have Land-use Regulations Affected Property values in Oregon?
sentences.chinese: 俄勒冈土地利用条例怎样影响不动产价值？

sentences.english: Registration of creation and cancellation of statutory mortgage according to the Public Housing Act.
sentences.chinese: 八依国民住宅条例规定法定抵押权之设定及涂销登记。

sentences.english: The Regulations Concerning the Prevention of Pollution of Sea Areas by Vessels of the P. C. C.
sentences.chinese: 中华人民共和国防止船舶污染海域管理条例。

definition: provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
to issue/to proclaim/to enact (laws, decrees etc)
to put in place/to put into practice/to take effect
